nodes.text: Ozz was a male Ugnaught and an ancestral leader of the Irden tribe who maintained his headquarters in the city of Ugnorgrad, on the planet Bespin.
Born approximately two hundred years prior to the Galactic Civil War, Ozz was one of many of his kind to manage the tibanna gas refineries in Cloud City.

Three years after the Battle of Yavin, King Ozz led the disgruntled Ugnaught workers in a revolt against the Imperial garrison that had taken control of Cloud City. They planted bombs throughout the city and retreated to their marshland haven at Ugnorgrad. Cloud City's cyborg agent, Lobot, disconnected all of the bombs, preventing them from exploding.

Soon after, the former Baron Administrator, Lando Calrissian, approached King Ozz and pledged to help the Ugnaughts retake Cloud City. Ozz sent a contingent of his workers, as well as a news crew, to aid in the assault. With the help of Luke Skywalker and Shira Brie, Ozz's allies successfully ousted the corrupt Imperial administrator, Captain Hugo Treece. Years later, he succeeded Lobot as Baron Administrator of Cloud City.
